snippet: Westchester County has failed to abide by a court order issued more than three years ago to build hundreds of affordable units.
abstract: Editorial contends Westchester County has failed to abide by court order issued more than three years ago to build hundreds of affordable apartments; warns die-hard resistance to civil-rights laws did not work out for the South half-a-century ago, and it will not work now.
lead_paragraph: Westchester County has failed to abide by a court order issued more than three years ago to build hundreds of affordable units.

headline.seo: Westchester Loses Again on Fair Housing
headline.main: Westchester Loses Again on Fair Housing
headline.print_headline: Westchester Loses Again on Fair Housing
